originalText.text: Doctor Podolanczuk is wonderful. She really cares about her patients. She always get back to you quickly if you use the patient portal to ask a question or for a medication refill. She always listens to everything you say and answers any questions. She is very knowledgeable. And very nice bedside manner.

originalText.text:
Dr Podolancuk is in a category all by herself. Thorough, doesn’t rush u, kind, caring, with more humanity than most people, no less a Dr’s.
The oncology dept is far superior than most.

originalText.text: As always Dr Anna Podilanczuk was wonderful!  Kind, thorough and very efficient. Her staff is very warm and helpful. Will continue my checkups as requested.

text.text: As always Dr Anna Podilanczuk was wonderful!  Kind, thorough and very efficient. Her staff is very warm and helpful. Will continue my checkups as requested.

originalText.text: Dr. Podalunczuk is just amazing. Caring, kind, thorough and utterly professional. No praise is high enough!

text.text: Dr. Podalunczuk is just amazing. Caring, kind, thorough and utterly professional. No praise is high enough!

originalText.text:
Dr Anna Podolanczuk MD
Pulmonalogist Weil Cornell is an Unbelievable diagnostic clinician and patient/family centered practitioner and advocate. I moved her last year from after spending my adult life as a acute care Masters trained RN, University professor and researcher. At the time of my move I received a diagnosis of Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis and not only had to find suitable living conditions but find experts for my various healthcare needs. Anna Podolanczuk MD
Pulmonalogist Weil Cornell, Dr Aronson and the entire team at the pulmonary Clinic provide expert care and support that I needed at a critical time in my life. My family and I feel blessed to be care for by this stellar care team. They certainly deserve a larger more well designed facility like the Cardiology Center at NYP- Cornell. They make the most of what they have but could benefit from a new environment.
